title: Daily Market Snapshot
content: The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, down 94.85 points to 19827.25, a move of  0.48%. On a point basis, the blue-chip index traded in its narrowest daily range in three years. The S&P 500 SPX, edged 7.62 points lower to 2271.31, a move of 0.34%, while the Nasdaq Composite Index COMP, tacked on 0.28%, or 15.25 points, to 5555.33.
